category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_apply_project_by_default_for_import
preference.preference_description: Set the value (Item or ItemRevision) to be toggled on in the Spreadsheet Editor by default, to indicate whether a project can be assigned to either an item or an item revision during the Import to Teamcenter process. Possible values: ItemRevision Item
